short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure your online privacy and access content from around the world with our fast and easy-to-use VPN addon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get complete anonymity while browsing the internet with this easy-to-use VPN extension (VPN Soft). Fast and reliable, with multiple country options to change your location with just one click. Protect your privacy and stay anonymous while you browse.

1. Easy to use – Set up in seconds with no technical skills required.
2. Extremely fast – Browse the web with no lag.
3. Multiple country options – Choose from a range of countries worldwide with ease.
4. Anonymity – Stay anonymous online by changing your location easily.

This extension is perfect for those seeking anonymity and privacy while browsing, with quick setup and smooth performance.
